XIII.i.3.D.2.d
.
Establishing Continued Entitlement to Medications
Establish continued entitlement to outpatient medications annually in those pension cases in which the current year income did
not
exceed the limit by more than $1,000.
Individual requests from the medical facility for income information for the next calendar year are received on
VA Form 10-7131
during the last three months of the current year.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D - Eligibility for Medical Services Associated With Aid and Attendance (A&A) or Housebound Status
